landing.headline: You're not here by accident.
landing.description: This is where artificial intelligence meets your awareness.

welcome.hello: Welcome to the space of Self
welcome.description: Describe yourself in one or a few sentences. This is the beginning of your echo.

about_you.placeholder: For example, I feel more than I know how to say...

confirm.delete_account_description: Are you sure you want to permanently delete your account?

campfires.no_campfires: No campfire has been lit yet. Start your first one.
campfires.starting_new_campfire.placeholder: Campfire name, e.g. do trees dream of rain?...
campfires.start_fire_hint: You need to choose at least one companion to name the campfire.
